name: Hello Mart
description:
Welcome to Hello Mart! As our new greeter, you have the important task of waving at people and helping them find what they need. We're always happy at Hello Mart!

Look at people with analog stick/arrow keys. Then press the key corresponding to the icon above their head.

Go Playstation controllers! For XBOX people, look up the buttons that match X, Square, Triangle, Circle

Check the main entry on the global game jam website

http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/hello-mart
